newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech power firm plans higher '96 dividend.
newsitem.headline: Czech power firm plans higher '96 dividend.

text.p: Czech regional power utility Prazska Energetika a.s. said on Tuesday it would propose a 25 crown gross dividend per share on 1996 earnings, up from 20 crowns the previous year.
"Gross dividend should be 2.5 percent of the (1,000 crown) nominal value," a company representative said.
The Prague-based regional electricity distributor posted a preliminary 1996 net profit of 362 million crowns, after 455 million in 1995.
